title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives in the application, the maximized state of views is lost.
OB: When switching perspectives, views that were previously maximized are no longer maximized. They revert to their default size and position.
EB: When switching perspectives, views that were previously maximized should remain maximized in the new perspective.
SR:
1. Launch the application and open multiple views.
2. Maximize one of the views.
3. Switch to a different perspective.
4. Observe that the maximized view is no longer maximized.
